SEARCH
Package movielist

Class MovieManager

java.lang.Object
movielist.MovieManager
public class MovieManager extends Object
The MovieManager class handles all operations related to a user's movie list, including adding, updating, deleting movies, and finding similarity scores between users. It interacts with the DatabaseManager and UserManager to perform database operations and manage in-memory movie data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a MovieManager with the specified user and database managers.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieManager

      public MovieManager(UserManager userManager, DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Constructs a MovieManager with the specified user and database managers.
      Parameters:
      userManager - the user manager for accessing user data
      dbManager - the database manager for executing movie-related database operations

  • Method Details

    • createMovieList

      public void createMovieList(User user)
      Allows a user to create a list of up to 10 favorite movies.
      Parameters:
      user - The user creating the list.

    • viewMovieList

      public void viewMovieList(User user)
      Displays a user's movie list and provides options to update or delete a movie.
      Parameters:
      user - The user viewing their movie list.

    • addMovie

      public boolean addMovie(User user, String movie)
      Adds a movie to the user's favorite list.
      Parameters:
      user - The user adding the movie.
      movie - The name of the movie to add.
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false if the list is full.

    • updateMovie

      public boolean updateMovie(User user, int index, String newMovie)
      Updates a movie in the user's list.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose movie will be updated.
      index - The index to update.
      newMovie - The new movie name.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the index is invalid.

    • deleteMovie

      public boolean deleteMovie(User user, int index)
      Deletes a movie from the user's list.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose movie will be deleted.
      index - The index of the movie to delete.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the index is invalid.

    • calculateSimilarityScore

      public Map<String,Double> calculateSimilarityScore(User user)
      Finds similarity scores between a user and others based on favorite movies.
      Parameters:
      user - The user searching for movie matches.
      Returns:
      A map of user IDs to similarity scores.

    • movieMatches

      public void movieMatches(User user)
      Finds and displays movie matches for a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user searching for movie matches.

    • deleteMovie

      public void deleteMovie(User user)
      Overloaded method for deleting a movie, handles user input.
      Parameters:
      user - The user deleting a movie.

    • loadUserMoviesFromDatabase

      public void loadUserMoviesFromDatabase()
      Loads all user movies from the database and adds them to their corresponding users in the UserManager. This uses a join between the users and movies tables.

    • addMovieToDatabase

      public boolean addMovieToDatabase(User user, String title)
      Adds a movie to the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user adding the movie
      title - the title of the movie to add
      Returns:
      true if the movie was successfully added to the database, otherwise false

    • updateMovieInDatabase

      public boolean updateMovieInDatabase(User user, String oldTitle, String newTitle)
      Updates the title of a movie in the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose movie is being updated
      oldTitle - the current title of the movie
      newTitle - the new title to replace the old one
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteMovieFromDatabase

      public boolean deleteMovieFromDatabase(User user, String title)
      Deletes a movie from the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose movie is being deleted
      title - the title of the movie to delete
      Returns:
      true if the movie was successfully deleted from the database, false otherwise

      public void loadUserMoviesFromDB(User user)
      Loads all movies for a user from the database and adds them to the user's movie list.
